label.bp-message: Go ahead, don’t be shy. Here is your chance to add a personal message to your card with some of those eloquent words you’re so well known for.

text.page_info: Send the E-Gift Card directly to your friend’s email inbox. Delivered within seconds, the email your friend receives will be on behalf of your email address. Once the transaction is complete, the E-Card will be emailed to the lucky recipient.

detail.recipient_name: The name of the person you're sending the card to

detail.from_name: The name of the person the card is from
detail.delivery_date: Send the card now or someday in the future...

text.page_info: A plastic gift card will be delivered to the provided address.
text.new_address: You can select a preview added address free of charge or enter a new address and choose another shipping method.
text.disclaimer:
Overnight shipping is available for shipments delivered anywhere in Canada. In areas between major urban centres, some restrictions apply.

Orders placed before 3 p.m. Eastern Standard Time (EST) on a business day will be delivered the next business day. For example, orders placed prior to 3 p.m. EST on Monday will be delivered on Tuesday, while orders placed after 3 p.m. EST on Monday will be delivered on Wednesday.

Orders placed on Friday after 1 p.m. EST and on Saturday or Sunday will be delivered on Tuesday. Business days do not include holidays or weekends.
